Collections

Ultimate Fantasy

Ultimate Fantasy is a collection of short stories, poems, and artworks generated by Queer AI, a GPT-2 machine learning model trained on 50,000+ conversational pairs derived from scripts in queer theatre. The texts have been minimally modified for flow, coherence and structure. All content is 100% A.I. generated. More at ultimatefantasy.club
